title: Fahrenheit to Celsius
description: In this lab, you will learn the fundamentals of JavaScript programming, including variables, data types, and functions, and practice converting Fahrenheit to Celsius using a custom function in Node.js.

meta.title: Mastering Fahrenheit to Celsius Conversion with JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to convert Fahrenheit to Celsius using JavaScript and Node.js in this comprehensive programming tutorial.
meta.keywords: nodejs, javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, programming tutorial, temperature conversion, javascript lab, fahrenheit to celsius, javascript tutor

verify.name: Verify Node Commands In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
